author: cms-sw
body: 10.3.X Ibs are failing due to py2-lz4 deps now requires newer version of setuptools. Instead of rebuilding all the python tools for 10.3.X , I suggest that we drop py2-lz4 ( looks like nothing is using it). In case it is really needed then we have to basicllay update setuptools and pip for python3
title: [10.3.X] Drop py2-lx4 deps as it does not build any more
